```{r}
library(dslice)
blah<-load_gct("Gender_hgu133a.gct")
summary(blah)
diabetes <- load_gct("Diabetes_hgu133a.gct")
summary(diabetes)
leukemia <- load_gct("Leukemia_hgu95av2.gct")
summary(leukemia)
p53 <- load_gct("P53_hgu95av2.gct")
summary(p53)
```
